type.name: property_source_select
type.description: A property_source_select specifies an External_library_reference and is a place holder for additional property sources.

entity.name: External_library_reference
entity.description: An External_library_reference specifies a a mechanism to refer to an entry in an external library other than ISO 13584.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The description specifies additional information about the External_library_reference. The description need not be specified for a particular External_library_reference. If present, there shall be exactly one object that defines the description for an External_library_reference.

explicit.name: external_id
explicit.description: The external_id specifies the unique identifier of the referenced entry in the external library.

explicit.name: library_type
explicit.description: The library_type specifies the type of library that is used.

entity.name: Independent_property
entity.description: An Independent_property specifies a property, independent of its use in the definition of a product.

explicit.name: allowed_unit
explicit.description:
specifies the unit or set of units that are accepted.
A company may accept a mass specified in kilograms or tons, but not in grams or pounds.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: specifies additional information about the Independent_property.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: specifies the identifier of the Independent_property.

explicit.name: property_source
explicit.description: The property_source specifies the object that defines this Independent_property.

entity.name: Independent_property_relationship
entity.description:
An Independent_property_relationship specifies a relationship between two Independent_property objects.
Independent_property_relationship may be used to indicate that the value of one Independent_property can be derived from the value of another Independent_property.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The description specifies additional information about the Independent_property_relationship. The description need not be specified for a particular Independent_property_relationship. If present, there shall be exactly one object that defines the description for an Independent_property_relationship.

explicit.name: related
explicit.description:
The related Independent_property specifies the second of the two Independent_property objects related by the Independent_property_relationship.
The semantics of this attribute are defined by the attribute relation_type. See Independent_property_relationship to Independent_property for the application assertion.

explicit.name: relating
explicit.description:
The relating specifies the first of the two Independent_property objects related by the Independent_property_relationship.
The semantics of this attribute are defined by the attribute relation_type. See Independent_property_relationship to Independent_property for the application assertion.

explicit.name: relation_type
